review: I have two of these now.  So much better than dropping $100 on something.  My phone, tablet, or PC can be used as the control.  Streams Netflix, Pandora, Watch ESPN  and others (hoping for Amazon to jump on soon).  Also, you can download games to play.  Spent more than a few nights with friends or family over playing The Big Web Quiz or Cards Against Humanity on the big screen TV because of this baby.

review: I love the google product. It functions well and is extremely useful for streaming on my TV's. My 2 TV's don't allow me to add apps, so I can only use their pre-loaded apps.My biggest complaint (and the reason this almost lost a star) is no one explains that all apps/websites need to be designed to work with ChromeCast (their are workarounds on a laptop). The only issue I've found is Amazon refuses to design the Amazon Instant App to work with ChromeCast (obviously in favor their product). So my biggest complaint with the Google product is Amazon.
